meanings_and_examples.definition: Endured negative consequences as a result of an event or action.
meanings_and_examples.example: After losing his job, he suffered the financial burden and emotional stress.
The patients in the clinic have all suffered from various symptoms of flu.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Experienced emotional pain or distress due to a particular situation or event.
meanings_and_examples.example: She suffered greatly when her beloved pet passed away.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Faced hardship, adversity, or difficulty in life.
meanings_and_examples.example: Many people have suffered from poverty and lack of access to basic necessities.
